resources.string: By sending in stack traces you are helping the ongoing development of Астрон\nWarning: This will use your XMPP account to send the stack trace to the developer.

Астрон utilizes a third party app called OpenKeychain to encrypt and decrypt messages and to manage your public keys.

OpenKeychain is licensed under GPLv3 and available on F-Droid and Google Play.

(Please restart Астрон afterwards.)
Астрон is unable to encrypt your messages because your contactPhone is not announcing his or hers public key.\n\nPlease ask your contactPhone to setup OpenPGP.
Астрон is unable to encrypt your messages because your contacts are not announcing their public key.\n\nPlease ask your contacts to setup OpenPGP.
The length of time Астрон keeps quiet after seeing activity on another device
By sending in stack traces you are helping the ongoing development of Астрон
Астрон needs access to external storage
Астрон needs access to the camera
Ваше устройство использует оптимизацию энергопотребления.\nРекомендуется его отключить.
Ваше устройство использует оптимизацию энергопотребления.\nСейчас появится предложение его отключить.
Извещать контакты когда вы используете Астрон

Your operating system is restricting Астрон from accessing the Internet when in background. To receive notifications of new messages you should allow Астрон unrestricted access when Data saver is on.\nАстрон will still make an effort to save data when possible.
Your device does not support disabling Data saver for Астрон.
To keep receiving notifications, even when the screen is turned off, you need to add Астрон to the list of protected apps.
Не удается отправить секретное сообщение %1$s. Это может быть связано с тем, что контакт не использует режим Секретно.
Астрон needs access to the microphone
This notification category is used to display a permanent notification indicating that Астрон is running.
